Trade/Device Name(s): Andon Health Care Management System Software
AG-608 Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-608 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AGS-1000 Single Blood Glucose Test Strips
AGS-1000 Multi Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Andon Health Care Management System Software and AG-608 Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for diabetes management via quantitative glucose measurement and data management.
Indications for Use Summary: Optional software accessory for Andon blood glucose meters to transfer, store, analyze, and communicate blood glucose test results for diabetes management in home and clinical settings; AG-608 meters measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood as an aid in monitoring diabetes control.
